title: No Straight Roads
notes: Native controller support **Decky Plugin: Works out of the box**. **2.0 Standalone: Works out of the box**.
publisher: H2 Interactive Co., Ltd., Sold Out, Fireshine Games
genre: Role-playing (RPG), Adventure, Hack and slash/Beat 'em up, Music
description: Welcome to Vinyl City! Play with Mayday and Zuke for the Musical Revolution in this action adventure game created by Wan Hazmer, one of the lead game designer of FF XV and Daim Dziauddin, SFV's concept artist.
